name: Tractor Racing ( 3D Heavy Monster Truck Race Game on Dirt Track )
name_original: Tractor Racing ( 3D Heavy Monster Truck Race Game on Dirt Track )
description:
These Heavy Pulling Machines Have Served you for Decades From Farming to Construction and did their best in every Industry they were introduced to.
And Now they are being Introduced to Gaming and Entertainment Industry Don't leave the chance to appreciate them.


Features:
- Cool Real Tractor
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Great sounds
- Universal for iPhone, iPod and iPad
- Improve hand eye co-ordination
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
